title: yahoo shows 147 msgs, t/bird says no new
content: subj line says it: current new mail is coming in - some 147 older mails in yahoo inbox are not seen by t/bird. I can't find anything obvious. New tbird release 140.0.1. It is correct, there are no NEW emails - how to get older ones?
creator: jeff-g

title: How to batch-edit calendar events (move to another calendar + assign category) ?
content:
Hello. Since calendar category colorization is not very visible ...

... I created separate calendars for every category. This is semantically wrong but has a nice look â€“ events are fully colored by category:

I now regret this choice and want to correct it:

I need to move >1000 calendar events from calendar "medical" to my "home" calendar and (at one go) assign the category "medical":

from [calendar: "medical" / category: none] --> to [calendar: "home" / category: "medical"]

How can I do this ?

(note: I don't know why the screenshots are not displayed in this message.)
creator: welcome
